sql:
SELECT
id,
id_tx,
COUNT(*) AS `RowCount`,
name,
address,
postal,
nric,
mobile,
tel,
email,
doc_upload,
office_tel,
remarks,
doc_name,
cus_type,
trade,
contact_person,
destination,
contact_email,
biz_email,
last_updated,
contact_person_id,
contact_person_cell,
salutation,
id_type,
country_incorporation,
`role`,
category,
tel_type,
billing_address,
billing_postal,
reg_date,
registration_no,
custid
FROM parties_involved
GROUP BY id_tx
ORDER BY id
name: parties_involved_count

label.text: Check this box if Billing Address same as Mailing Address.
Check this box if Billing Address same as Mailing Address.
